name: YoutubeSubscriptionVerification
description: Verifies if a user is subscribed to the Apex Fusion YouTube channel

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: The YouTube API key used to authenticate and authorize requests to the YouTube Data API.

parameters.name: apexChannelId
parameters.description: The ID of the apex YouTube channel that the user is expected to be subscribed to.

parameters.name: userChannelId
parameters.description: The ID of the user's YouTube channel whose subscription status is being verified.
